definition: thick/deep or profound/kind/generous/rich or strong in flavor/to favor/to stress
"cliff" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 27), occurring in 原, 历, 压 etc
dense/thick (fog, clouds etc)/to have a strong interest in/deep/fully saturated (color)
blessed by heaven (idiom)/enjoying exceptional advantages/favored by nature
see 未可厚非[wei4 ke3 hou4 fei1]
He Houhua (1955-), Macau financier and politician, first magistrate from 1999

sentences.english: Melon's skin is thin, only about one-third of thick watermelon rind.
sentences.chinese: 哈密瓜的皮很薄，大约只有西瓜皮的三分之一厚。

sentences.english: Micro - electroforming is characterized by both resist - patterned electroplating and resist - structural electrodepositing.
sentences.chinese: 微电铸工艺兼具掩膜电镀和厚膜结构电铸的双重特征。

sentences.english: The cost is dropped remarkably when cutting thick steel plate.
sentences.chinese: 用于厚钢板气割时节约成本显著。

sentences.english: Both made of pine; both one inch thick.
sentences.chinese: 都是由松木做成的，都是一英寸厚。

sentences.english: Players may wear a pair of thick socks and lights, soft-soled running shoes.
sentences.chinese: 参加者可穿一对厚袜子及轻而鞋底较软的跑鞋。

sentences.english: Underneath their fur, polar bears have an additional 10-cm-layer of fat, called blubber.
sentences.chinese: 在毛皮的下面还有一层十厘米厚的脂肪，名为鲸脂。

sentences.english: Is your new number one starting to lay it on a little to thick?
sentences.chinese: 是你的新号码一开始，奠定它在一个小到厚呢？

sentences.english: The cylindrical shells and open shells with discontinuity and dissymmetry in thickness are considered as laminated shells.
sentences.chinese: 视壁厚不连续不对称的圆柱壳或开口壳为层合壳。

sentences.english: My dog has long, thick hair that habours fleas.
sentences.chinese: 我的狗生有长而厚的毛，易藏跳蚤。

sentences.english: Fortunately my friend had a sweater, and I tied it around my waist.
sentences.chinese: 幸运的是我朋友有一件厚运动衫，我把它缠在了腰上。

sentences.english: Sometimes bears need even thicker skins.
sentences.chinese: 有时候，卖空者的皮要厚一点。

sentences.english: Would you make me an overcoat out of this heavy woolen cloth?
sentences.chinese: 请你用这块厚呢子给我做件大衣好吗？

sentences.english: The factory is a medium-sized enterprise specializing in design and manufacture of thick-leather sofas.
sentences.chinese: 本厂是一家专业设计制造厚皮沙发中型企业。

sentences.english: This paper analyzes the stability behavior of large tapered floating-roof steel storage tanks according to measured settlements.
sentences.chinese: 基于实测沉降数据考察变壁厚浮顶型钢储罐的稳定性。

sentences.english: In Wisconsin, ten inches of snow could fall.
sentences.chinese: 而在威斯康星，积雪竟达10英寸厚。

definition: meager/slight/weak/ungenerous or unkind/frivolous/to despise/to belittle/to look down on/to approach or near
to favor one and discriminate against the other (abbr. for 厚此薄彼[hou4 ci3 bo2 bi3])
thin or slender/finely particulate/thin and soft/fine/delicate/trifling/(of a sound) quiet/frugal
